attributes.additional_details:
Would you as a human be willing to make yourself a subject of cruel testing?
The answer is probably no. Now think about the poor animals who are used as lab rats with no say in the matter. It's unethical to sentence 100 million thinking, feeling animals to life in a laboratory cage and intentionally cause them pain, loneliness and fear.
JOIN US NOW in our fight in ending this dreadful practice.
attributes.background: Pass a law to forbid animal testing in the UK

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314663
